meanings.definition: A person who leaves their own country to settle permanently in another.
meanings.sent1: The emigrants were excited to start a new life in a different land.
meanings.sent2: Many emigrants sailed across the ocean to find a better future.
meanings.sent3: The emigrants joked about bringing their favorite foods from home to the new country.
meanings.sent4: The idea of being an emigrant is like planting yourself in a new soil to grow.
meanings.sent5: The image of emigrants waving goodbye on the ship was etched in their memories.

meanings.definition: A group of people who leave their own country to settle permanently in another.
meanings.sent1: The small village had a close-knit community of emigrants who supported each other.
meanings.sent2: An entire village of emigrants moved to the new country together.
meanings.sent3: The emigrants organized a potluck to celebrate their new beginning.
meanings.sent4: The group of emigrants was like a flock of birds migrating to a warmer place.
meanings.sent5: The sight of emigrants walking in a line towards their new home was heartwarming.
